thread.title: Late Night London launch Rugby World Cup Packages
thread.title_full: Late Night London launch Rugby World Cup Packages

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Late Night London launch Rugby World Cup Packages
text:
Late Night London launch Rugby World Cup Packages Late Night London launch Rugby World Cup Packages Details Category: Venues & Events Created   15:00 Late Night London meetings and events team have launched a collection of Rugby World Cup packages to meet the demands of their corporate clients. The Rugby World Cup, the largest sporting event to be held in the UK since the 2012 Olympic Games is expected to boost the UK economy by £982m (Ernst Young, 2015). 
Each package has been tailored to the requirements of Late Night London’s corporate clients from price to location to entertainment. Prices start from £10pp through to the £70pp package that includes a sport’s personality speaker. Georgina Coleman, Head of Event Sales for the bar and restaurant operator commented: "Large scale sporting events allow Late Night London to showcase the versatility of our venues. There aren’t many venues in the UK, who can meet the space requirements and budgets that clients are looking for, for this type of event". Late Night London have had a strong start to 2015, with a number of venues undergoing refurbishments including West End favourite Tiger Tiger. They have also welcomed new brands to the estate including Scarlet’s Leicester Square and Mabel’s Covent Garden. Related articles
